header.title: Woman assaulted two trans women at karaoke night after saying ‘what is that?’
header.postText: A mum-of-three assaulted two transgender women after screaming: ‘What is that? That is a man.’', 'Jessica Dare has since written apology letters to her victims and described her own actions as ‘horrendous’, Chester Magistrates Court heard.', 'The 47-year-old has pleaded guilty to three counts of assault – but stressed she had been out drinking and did not remember what happened.', 'The two trans women were singing karaoke at Oddfellows Arms in Chester on September 29 when Dare insulted them, the court heard.', 'One of the victims confronted Dare – who grabbed her by the neck in response.', 'During the ensuing fight, Dare, of Upton, in Chester, Cheshire, struck the other woman on the side of the face.', 'The third assault took place outside the pub on the same evening.', 'Dare made further comments towards a non-trans victim and committed another assault.', 'Since then, Dare has stated her regret in letters to the victims and, after being shown CCTV footage, described her actions as ‘horrendous’, her solicitor said.', 'She was fined £335, ordered to pay £250 compensation to her three victims, handed a 12-month community order and given a curfew for nine weeks.', 'In January, LGBT charity Stonewall revealed more than a third of all transgender people in the UK have been victims of a hate crime in the past 12 months.', 'Campaigners branded the statistics the ‘tip of the iceberg’, as they claim many other victims do not feel safe to even report their attacks.

commentThread.commentText: stop trying to erase us. you will never be women MEN my ancestors didnt fight for a whole century for women's rights just so blokes can put on a skirt and steal our entire gender and erase us and pretend we don't exist FU

replies.commentText: I see nothing about anyone being erased here, I see an article about a drunk woman attacking innocent people minding their own business.

Lucy Brown im sick of blokes putting on skirts and then telling us we're not allowed to be real women because they're the new women I HATE THIS EVIL AGENDA ITS AN INSULT AND GROSS AND OFFENSIVE STOP TRYING TO GENOCIDE OUR ENTIRE GENDER
That's right, I stole your whole gender and you're not getting it back until you learn to behave.

Miriam Thorvik Holberg piss off. my ancestors didnt fight for my rights just so you blokes could come along and put on a skirt and make a mockery of all our hard work take the piss out of our suffering and denigrate us
I didn't realise people could steal genders. I'm gonna hold gender over my head like an older sibling. Nuh uh, you can't have your gender back until you apologise!
The only folks around here trying to erase anyone is bigoted losers like you trying to erase trans folks.
Caitlín M Forester lol who says that exactly? nobody has ever said that to me or any woman I know, has it actually happened to you?

Caitlín M Forester What's more transpeops are a teeny weeny percentage of the population, pretty much as far as I know they just want to get on with life quietly and unhassled, pretty sure they are not about erasing anyone.
No ones trying to erase you. FFS get a grip and some empathy.

commentThread.commentText: Imagine this being your reaction to someone getting assaulted

replies.commentText: Imagine also for a single second that hormone treatment takes any body strength you may of previously had living as a male . Now imagine that regardless of gender the two VICTIMS are actually decent human beings that wouldn’t dream of retaliation using violence , and finally- if at all possible try and get your head round the fact that violence against anyone is disgusting.

commentThread.commentText: Imagine reporting this like it isn't partly your fault, considering the full page ad you allowed to run in your newspaper attacking trandgender rights reforms.You are part of the problem, Metro. You allowed this narrative.
Don't reply unless you know what it's like to be trans or at least have empathy

As to the two women true feelings come to fore they were bigots before they were drunk so there true Un-educated feelings come out when drunk so judge give them 12 months and don't listen to there excuses
